Fagnant et al. (2020): each line is a gauge from the same \(5^\circ \times 3^\circ\) region






NONSTATIONARY MODELS

NEED MORE PARAMETERS

Generic nonstationary model for annual maximum precipitation: \[
y(\vb{s}, t) \sim \text{GEV} \left( \mu(\vb{s}, t), \sigma(\vb{s}, t), \xi(\vb{s}, t) \right)
\]


Process-informed models condition parameters on climate indices \(\vb{X}(t)\) (Cheng & AghaKouchak, 2014; Schlef et al., 2023) \[
\theta(\vb{s}, t) = \alpha + \overbrace{\beta(\vb{s})}^\text{more params} \times \overbrace{\vb{X}(t)}^\text{climate}
\] for \(\theta \in \{\mu, \sigma, \xi \}\)
